[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/core-types](./core-types.md) &gt; [NodeExtensionSpec](./core-types.nodeextensionspec.md) &gt; [toDOM](./core-types.nodeextensionspec.todom.md)

## NodeExtensionSpec.toDOM property

Defines the default way a node of this type should be serialized to DOM/HTML (as used by \[`DOMSerializer.fromSchema`<!-- -->\](\#model.DOMSerializer^fromSchema)).

Should return a [DOMOutputSpec](./core-types.domoutputspec.md) that describes a DOM node, with an optional number zero (“hole”) in it to indicate where the node's content should be inserted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toDOM?: (node: ProsemirrorNode) => DOMOutputSpec;
```
